AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Science - Bachelor of Engineering (Specialisation) with Honours in Engineering
AUSTRALIA.Description: This Bachelor of Science - Bachelor of Engineering (Specialisation) with Honours in Engineering degree from University of Tasmania provides you the option to combine specialisations from science and engineering to create a truly customised degree that delivers a powerful blend of knowledge and skills.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Commerce
AUSTRALIA.Description: This Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Commerce degree from Curtin University offers you the opportunity to study a wide range of majors from the Bachelor of Arts and Bachelor of Commerce. Combining studies in arts and business has many benefits, including the ability to think outside the box and apply transferable skills in both creative and commerce careers.

A community is a social group whose members live in a specific location, share government and often have a common cultural and historical heritage. We offer a bachelor degree in Community, Culture and Environment at University of Wollongong.

Want to make positive changes and help the Third World? The ANU Bachelor of Development Studies (with Year in Asia) is the right degree for you. The Australian National University is a leader in the field of Development Studies and has established relationships with Australian and international aid and development organisations.

While your Bachelor of Arts in Western Civilisation degree introduced you to a wide range of themes and issues, an Honours project provides you with the opportunity to focus your interest on a topic of choice, exploring it in greater depth and detail to find answers. We offer a bachelor degree in Western Civilisation (Honours) at University of Wollongong.
A feeder to Engineering for those with less mathematics. Study Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) - General Entry at Flinders University.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Business and Bachelor of Science
AUSTRALIA.Description: Bachelor of Business and Bachelor of Science program is offered by University of Southern Queensland. Study a double degree as it takes less time than doing the degrees separately, can save you time and money, and you graduate with two testamurs (official certificates) for each of your degrees.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Business - Bachelor of Laws
AUSTRALIA.Description: Combine a comprehensive business foundation with a mastery of the law with a double degree in Bachelor of Business - Bachelor of Laws at Bond University.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Business - Bachelor of Laws (Honours)
AUSTRALIA.Description: Students completing this combined Bachelor of Business - Bachelor of Laws (Honours) degree program from University of Newcastle become specialists in Business and meet the academic requirements to practice law in NSW.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Arts - Bachelor of Laws
AUSTRALIA.Description: You can complete two degrees at Bond in less time than you could graduate with just one at most other universities with the Bachelor of Arts - Bachelor of Laws program from Bond University

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Commerce - Bachelor of Laws
AUSTRALIA.Description: In this double Bachelor of Commerce - Bachelor of Laws degree from Bond University, you will gain a sound understanding of law and commerce preparing you for a career in law, business, industry or government both within Australia or overseas.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Commerce - Bachelor of Arts
AUSTRALIA.Description: Gain highly valued business skills in addition to the range of competencies an Arts degree can offer in this Bachelor of Commerce - Bachelor of Arts double degree from University of New South Wales.

AUSTRALIA.Programs: Bachelor of Criminology and Bachelor of Communication
AUSTRALIA.Description: Advance your creative thinking and communication skills as you learn to investigate social problems and crime from a criminal behaviour perspective with The Bachelor of Criminology and Bachelor of Communication combined degree offered at Murdoch University.

The international M.Eng. / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Master of Professional Engineering (Civil) program from University of Newcastle prepares students for a career in an international environment in Newcastle, New South Wales, Australia.

The international Master / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Professional Accounting (Extension) program from University of Technology Sydney prepares students for a career in an international environment in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia.

The international M.A. / Full-time / On Campus Professional Writing and Publishing Major (MArts) program from Curtin University prepares students for a career in an international environment in Perth, Western Australia, Australia.

AUSTRALIA.UniversityName: Professional Information Technology (with specialisations)- Software Development specialisation
AUSTRALIA.Description: The international Master / Full-time / On Campus Professional Information Technology (with specialisations)- Software Development specialisation program from Charles Sturt University prepares students for a career in an international environment in Port Macquarie, New South Wales, Australia.
AUSTRALIA.UniversityLocation: Port Macquarie, New South Wales, Australia

AUSTRALIA.Description: The international Postgraduate Certificate / Full-time / On Campus Health Leadership and Management program from University of Canberra prepares students for a career in an international environment in Canberra, Australian Capital Territory, Australia.

The international Postgraduate Diploma / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Tourism, Environmental and Cultural Heritage program from University of Tasmania prepares students for a career in an international environment in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia.

The international Master / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Business Analytics program from Kaplan Business School prepares students for a career in an international environment in Multiple locations.
The international Master / Full-time / On Campus Dietetic Practice program from Australian Catholic University prepares students for a career in an international environment in Multiple locations.

The international Master / Full-time, Part-time / Online, On Campus Sports Nutrition by Research program from University of the Sunshine Coast prepares students for a career in an international environment in Multiple locations.
